[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1592921666115{margin-bottom: -20px !important;background-image: url(https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/homepage-header-e1591132115768.jpg?id=24277) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592922179715{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”120px” el_class=”dondon”][vc_single_image image=”25700″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”120px” el_class=”dondon”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1592934855279{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1579202028422{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1619468506368{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”padding0100″]

If you landed on this SEO page, you most likely did a Google search for Toronto SEO. You found A Nerd’s World because we practice what we preach and understand the most important ranking factors on Google.  With our custom month-to-month approach to SEO, Google ranks us #1 and we offer the same service for your business.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1588969382828{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1579202028422{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1615927384007{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”seo-king”]Dear business owners,

My name is Chris A. Hughes and I’m the Co-founder & SEO Manager at A Nerd’s World in Toronto.

If they can’t rank their own business website above us, How can they rank yours?

Wouldn’t it be incredible if you were able to rank #1 on Google?

Take a moment to imagine just how much more work you could accomplish with a reliable Toronto SEO team on your side. You would be able to focus on the parts of your business that require your attention as you grow your business, while we get you the rankings to increase your profits.

SEO has become quite the trendy acronym amongst aspiring ‘entrepreneurs’, ‘gurus’ and ‘digital marketing experts’ amongst other fly-by-night snake oil salesmen. It is a buzzword that is often used to convince someone that they know what they’re talking about without carrying any weight behind their words. We however have been proudly providing quality SEO since 2006. As an authority in SEO many would expect that we may take offence to the fakers, however we see it as a chance to educate our clients and the world. We use it as an opportunity to show the light!

You would be able to push the bounds of your drive to succeed knowing there is a team working tirelessly dedicated to generating the website traffic that you deserve. Through an abundance of experience as well as a process of reverse engineering success, we are passionate and confident that our company will place your website on the first page of Google (consistently) through highly adaptable custom Toronto SEO strategies that make sense with your business and industry.

No need to take our word for it: the proof is in the pudding. Over the years our search engine optimization strategies have generated millions of dollars in leads for our clients. The reason we are successful in what we do is because we are real people, working together in an office located in the heart of downtown Toronto, every day, with unparalleled work ethic. We have our fingertips on the pulse of Google’s search algorithm and ranking system and care deeply about using our vehicle to help your business grow.

The majority of our SEO competitors in Toronto have established their bread and butter on the presumption that what they do is not totally understood by the public. This gives them room to move under a cloak, selling you an altruistic future based on the prospect of magic. We are very much the opposite of this. We understand that SEO is the main arena for competition in sales in modern day, and so we place the utmost importance on a clean, ethical white hat SEO strategy that will develop not simply leads, but quality leads for your business. No outsourcing, no bullshit, just results. We’re waiting for you.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30″][vc_btn title=”SCHEDULE A FREE SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION CONSULTATION WITH CHRIS A. HUGHES” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”open-seo-pop”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1593184126297{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column parallax=”content-moving” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1591893422154{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”letter-post”]

SEO: IT’S ALL ABOUT RETURN ON INVESTMENT

Underquoting an SEO client is a surefire way of getting the worst return on investment possible.This is because SEO is an ongoing competition.  It is a search engine ranking race where the goal is to not simply finish first, but to remain at the front of the pack; to influence the direction of those behind you.

Assuming there are many in front of you, it is important to understand just how fast you have to run to surpass the competition. If you keep running at the same speed you will never catch up.

Your investment in SEO is what will determine your speed and your ranking. You want to run faster? Invest more! More budget means more time. Akin to a personal trainer, the more time you spend, the more progress you will see.

If you are investing $200 a month, and those ahead of you are investing $2500 a month, how are you supposed to surpass them? You cannot. It is important to calculate work on your speed so that results can be guaranteed.

If you were to invest $2000 a month, you could open up many avenues to revenue and strategically place yourself at the top of Google. With active leads and an additional $10,000 – $50,000 coming in, you would have an excellent return on investment.

GET A FREE 30-MINUTE CUSTOM SEO STRATEGY CONSULTATION

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1591981289305{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1591893815309{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”flipImg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1591893788670{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”hide-on-mobile”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column parallax=”content-moving” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1582141403317{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”letter-post”]

IF YOU WANT A $200/MONTH SEO COMPANY, THEN WE’RE NOT A GREAT FIT

As you’ve been informed, it is paramount that an SEO budget receives the investment it needs to nurture your online business. For this reason we simply do not onboard those who do not understand the importance of this principle.With a budget of four, five, six hundred dollars a month, we will not be able to achieve great a ROI.  Over the last 15+ years we have seen the positive effect that a proper SEO strategy can have on a business, the amount of happiness it can muster. On the other hand we have also seen the ineffectiveness of an SEO strategy that lacks luster, and the mill of frustration one may find themselves in without a proper understanding of their investment.

We have achieved our understanding through years of trial, error and reverse engineering. There is no online course, or ‘SEO plug-in’ that you can ingest that will unlock the power of our in house team of SEO nerds.

Put it this way: if you were to hire an in-house full time SEO expert, a salary of $120,000 a year or more would not require so much thought.  So why do you bat the idea of having an entire team working with the success of your business as their entire goal for as little as $6000 a year? 

GET A FREE 30-MINUTE CUSTOM SEO STRATEGY CONSULTATION

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin” css=”.vc_custom_1593183433871{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1579031209750{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

3 STEPS TO A HIGHER RANK ON GOOGLE

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

We live and breathe Search Engine Optimization. No really, we do. We ditched the smoke and mirrors, secret SEO recipes to success and decided very early on to be the best at what we do. We used our talents, to create our values, our structure, process and custom digital marketing strategies. Creating an in-house culture, that lets these behaviours and actions live and grow. It sounds simple, but it really works.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1591982185985{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1579032208862{margin-top: -100px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Start generating more traffic and more interest in your business. It’s 2020 and time to get a positive return on your investment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_btn title=”TALK TO A SEO COMPANY IN TORONTO” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”open-seo-pop”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”45px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1579139235562{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

DID YOU KNOW THAT WE RANK #1 ON GOOGLE?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

We provide in-house white hat Search Engine Optimization (SEO) services that have stood the test of time – since 2006 to be exact. Our custom SEO strategies are extremely powerful and proven to rank your website at the top of Google. Serious business owners hire us and our trusted team of in-house nerds for real results. It’s that simple.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”27061″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593012868756{padding-top: 60px !important;}” el_class=”center-videos-mobile”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1588958637927{background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column_text]

HUGHES” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”open-seo-pop”][vc_empty_space height=”45px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”jump-section home-services vc-no-bottom-margin” css=”.vc_custom_1598541107587{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592225171075{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30″][vc_btn title=”SCHEDULE A FREE SEO CONSULTATION TODAY!” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”open-seo-pop”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin” css=”.vc_custom_1592923509330{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581368941676{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

Here are some of our most frequently answered Search Engine Optmization questions and answers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_toggle title=”What does SEO stand for?”]As you may know, SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization. But what does that mean? And what does search engine optimization entail? In short, SEO is focused upon acquiring website traffic and high search result rankings organically. By organic, we mean without paying for web traffic via pay-per-click ads, among other methods. Within SEO, there’s a wide variety of strategies to accomplish the aforementioned goals—some of which are more effective than others. This could be anything from developing website content around keywords related to your industry to maintaining a strong presence across multiple social media platforms. SEO practices and strategies are constantly changing to remain effective as internet search engines continuously update algorithms.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How much does SEO cost?”]To answer this question our SEO team would need to know more information about your business. We can tell you one thing though, from our 14+ years of analysing thousands of SEO campaigns, the biggest reason why most campaigns fail (possibly yours in the past too), is that the company fails to properly assess the amount of work required to get you a great result and ROI.

That being said, our SEO packages range from $1000-10,000 per month with no-contract.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How long does SEO take?”]To answer this question depends greatly on where you are today, what SEO has been done before, and what your competition levels are like.

As a general rule of thumb, most websites on page 2 can be brought to the first page inside 3 months. As for a brand new website, you’re looking closer to 6+ months to get good first page rankings on competitive keywords.

During that time your leads and traffic will increase gradually and regularliy, but the big wins are once you hit the top half of the first page.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What is the ROI on SEO?”]Generally more than you could ever imagine. We’ve had clients grow their online sales by 1000% in 16-months, which represented an ROI of over 20X. However, the true value in SEO is that the traffic and leads you acquire last for a very long time.

For example – our SEO specialists did the calculations and a Plumber in Toronto, from a 12-month custom SEO campaign could receive over 25X their money back in profit over the 12-months after their campaign is completed. Yet in the following 12-months, when they aren’t spending on SEO, their ROI jumps as high as 50X![/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Can you get me to #1 on Google?”]Our team of SEO specialists will get you to the best possible position for your market, and flood your business with new organic traffic. From our 14+ years of SEO experience, it’s better to focus on ranking your business for the right keywords than just chasing #1’s. If #1 is possible for the right terms, then we’ll give it everything to get you there.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Will my results drop if I stop doing SEO?”]SEO is much like going to the gym. After working out for 12-months straight, you’re going to be in great shape, and even if you stop for 3-months, you’re going to maintain a pretty good physique. However over time your results will drop off, and you’ll need a tune up.

The same is true for your SEO. Everything we do is permanent & long term, however with time your competition may work and out-rank you. If this happens after your campaign ends, simply give our SEO team a call and we will walk you through how we fix it.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”I’ve done SEO before and it hasn’t worked, why are you different?”]If SEO hasn’t worked then one of four things has occurred:

  1. You’ve been ripped off by a scammer – Sadly there are a lot in this SEO industry, and if this has happened to you, we’re truly sorry – stopping these people is the reason our team is so passionate about Search Engine Optimization.
  2. You were working with a website designer, developer, or marketing agency –  SEO is a lot like brain surgery. It’s a very detailed, specific skillset that very few people truly possess. A lot of website design, marketing, or graphic design companies offer ‘SEO’ as a service, however they are not experienced in the craft. They are good at many things, but you don’t want your logo designer doing your SEO.
  3. Your SEO company didn’t know what they were doing – This is much more common than you would think. You see, lots of people start ‘SEO’ companies after watching a few YouTube videos, or buying a $4 e-Book. They think that they can learn along the way, and sadly, they convince many business owners that they know what they are doing when they truly have no clue. SEO, is a skill set that takes decades to master and hiring a newbie disguised as a guru will leave you disappointed in your rankings.
  4. Your company didn’t do enough to beat tough competition – If you paid $100, or even $500/month for SEO in the past, then chances are your campaign wasn’t aggressive enough, or have enough effort and resources required to beat out tough competition.
